description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Glide is a fast paced game of air hockey for up to 4 players. Supports local, system link and network multiplayer games. For an added challenge, try your hand at the block breaking action of Puckbreaker mode.
description.short: Glide is a fast paced game of air hockey for up to 4 players. Supports local, system link and network multiplayer games. For an added challenge, try your hand at the block breaking action of Puckbreaker mode.
